welcome_message_body: Welcome to Samarinda, the bustling city known for its rich cultural heritage, beautiful riverside views, and vibrant markets. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the charm of our city during your visit. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: RM. Raja Kepala Ikan Awang Long
restaurants.description: RM. Raja Kepala Ikan Awang Long is a seafood restaurant located in Samarinda.
restaurants.address: Jl. Awang Long, Samarinda, Kalimantan Timur

restaurants.name: Depot Pusaka Indah (Soto Veteran)
restaurants.description: Depot Pusaka Indah (Soto Veteran) is a soup spot located in Samarinda.

restaurants.name: Warung Padang Upik
restaurants.description: Warung Padang Upik is a asian restaurant located in Samarinda.

restaurants.name: Gudeg Oseng-Oseng Mercon
restaurants.description: Gudeg Oseng-Oseng Mercon is a indonesian restaurant located in Samarinda.
restaurants.address: Lapangan Kinibalu (Jenderal Sudirman), Samarinda, Kalimantan Timur

restaurants.name: Kopirenk
restaurants.description: Kopirenk is a café located in Samarinda.
restaurants.address: Jl. R.E. Martadinata (Teluk Lerong), Samarinda, Kalimantan Timur
